Sentencas: Ceramic-metal composites (cermets) containing 4 mol% yttria-zirconia (4YSZ) and Ni particles as anode materials in solid oxide fuel cells were prepared by two methods.
Titulo: Structural, microstructural, thermal, and electrical properties of Ni/YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: The first method involves nickel oxalate dihydrate precipitation on the 4YSZ powder and decomposition at 360 A degrees C in inert Ar atmosphere.
Titulo: Structural, microstructural, thermal, and electrical properties of Ni/YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: The second method consists of impregnation of the 4YSZ pellets with an aqueous solution of nickel nitrate.
Titulo: Structural, microstructural, thermal, and electrical properties of Ni/YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: The temperature of oxalate decomposition was determined on the basis of TG/DTA experiments.
Titulo: Structural, microstructural, thermal, and electrical properties of Ni/YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: Gaseous products of decomposition were analyzed by mass spectrometry.
Titulo: Structural, microstructural, thermal, and electrical properties of Ni/YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: The structure of the materials was characterized by X-ray diffraction, scanning electron microscopy, porosity studies, and particle size measurements.
Titulo: Structural, microstructural, thermal, and electrical properties of Ni/YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) was determined by dilathometric method.
Titulo: Structural, microstructural, thermal, and electrical properties of Ni/YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy was used to determine the electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Structural, microstructural, thermal, and electrical properties of Ni/YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: Thus, determined TECs, porosity, and electrical properties were found suitable for anode materials of fuel cells.
Titulo: Structural, microstructural, thermal, and electrical properties of Ni/YSZ cermet materials
